question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. yellow bus on the left
B. sign with a person on it
C. None
D. None

options.B: sign with a person on it

triage_reason: The sign with a person on it is on a building to the right, which is clearly in the foreground relative to the yellow bus on the left, which is further down the road.
